text: Nabiyow Yalli tabuuk gaaduk munaafiqhiin buttak tû fanah Madiina koo gacseeh aka gaaduh kô luk yawqeenimih idini koo essereenik inkinnah wadiriik yô luk matawqaanaay inkinnah qaduwwit qeb yô luk mabtaana, diggah isin naharsi adda daffeynat leeddeenik raaqe marâ luk daffeya (toh agabuvy, salaadaay, lakmisa mara kinnuk) keenik ixxic
